name: William's Love Prelude
description:
William, a boy living in the woods village of "Woodbell", fell in love with his childhood friend Emilia.
He dares to convey love, but she likes a strong man!

William decides to get stronger to turn her around ...


■ An orthodox JRPG style game.
■ Remake of a game released as a free game "ウィルと森の恋奏曲".
■ There are 4 endings in the game. It depends on your actions.
